chapter.text: You look at the countless faces of the most memorable students from past years.^1500 People that you have never known personally, but these people are worth remembering more than all of the others.^1500 But there are countless trophy cases in countless schools that you donâ€™t even know about, so how important can these people really be?^1500 You shake out of the existentialism and get back to searching for what made the glass break.^1500 You search the case to find a small branch has made its way inside, seemingly thrown at the glass.
